# StringExtensions.Reverse method

Returns a String that contains the value of *value* parameter reversed.

```csharp
public static string Reverse(this string value)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| value | The String to reverse. |

## Return Value

A new String that contains the value of *value* parameter reversed.
